description: This file sets up and demonstrates the usage of an agent with memory and storage components, including printing responses based on user input.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that interacts with memory, storage, and models to generate responses.

classes.name: Memory
classes.description: Handles in-memory data storage for the agent.

classes.name: SqliteMemoryDb
classes.description: SQLite database backend for storing memory data.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model interface for OpenAI's chat models.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: SQLite storage backend for session data.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response from the agent based on input text, with options for streaming and context.
